name: Lambo OG
description: Created by TH Seeds, Lambo is notable for being bred specifically to grow well outside. A cross of Jamaican Haze, Jamaican Purple and Super Afghan, this “guerilla grower” has a strong natural resistance to molds and pests and an 8 week flowering time, making it ideal for those in warmer climates who want to give outdoor growing a try. Originally named Rambo, this strain has been redubbed thanks to some litigious copyright people, but it’s still the same good stuff.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Happy, Creative, Aroused, Giggly, Pain, Nausea, Stress, Headaches, Depression, Dizzy, Headache, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid
